G0: General purpose container without ventilation — opening(s) at one end or both ends
G1: General purpose container without ventilation — passive vents at upper part of cargo space
G2: General purpose container without ventilation — opening(s) at one or both ends + "full" opening(s) on one or both sides
G3: General purpose container without ventilation — opening(s) at one or both ends + "partial" opening(s) on one or both sides
G9: General purpose container without ventilation — with bulk capabilities
V0: General purpose container with ventilation — non-mechanical system, vents at lower and uppper parts of cargo space
V2: General purpose container with ventilation — mechanical ventilation system, located internally
V4: General purpose container with ventilation — mechanical ventilation system, located externally
B3: Dry bulk container — horizontal disharge, test pressure 150 kPa
B4: Dry bulk container — horizontal disharge, test pressure 265 kPa
B5: Dry bulk container — tipping disharge, test pressure 150 kPa
B6: Dry bulk container — tipping disharge, test pressure 265 kPa
B7: Dry bulk container — with open top container with full length and width bottom discharge
B8: Dry bulk container — front discharge / full width
S2: Named cargo container — live fish carrier
S8: Named cargo container — non-cargo carrying container for sensitive installed equipment
S9: Named cargo container — non-cargo carrying containers for residential or commercial use
R1: Thermal container — mechanically refrigerated and heated
R3: Thermal container — self-powered mechanically refrigerated and heated
R5: Thermal container — integrated mechanically refrigerated and heated
H0: Thermal container — refrigerated and/or heated, with removable equipment located externally; heat transfer coefficient K=0,4W/(m²⋅K)
H1: Thermal container — refrigerated and/or heated, with removable equipment located internally
H2: Thermal container — refrigerated and/or heated, with removable equipment located externally; heat transfer coefficient K=0,7W/(m²⋅K)
H5: Thermal container — insulated; heat transfer coefficient K=0,4W/(m²⋅K)
H6: Thermal container — insulated; heat transfer coefficient K=0,7W/(m²⋅K)
H7: Thermal container — eutectic, remote mechanical refrigeration
W0: Foldable general purpose containers — container folding on their base structure
W1: Foldable general purpose containers — container folding on their side structure
U0: Open-top container — opening(s) at one or both ends
U1: Open-top container — opening(s) at one or both ends + removable top member(s) in end frames
U2: Open-top container — opening(s) at one or both ends + opening(s) on one or both sides
U3: Open-top container — opening(s) at one or both ends + opening(s) on one or both sides + removable top member(s) in end frames
U4: Open-top container — opening(s) at one or both ends + partial opening on one side and full opening on the other side
U6: Open-top container — open topped container with removable hard top
P1: Platform (container) — two complete and fixed ends
P2: Platform (container) — fixed posts, either freestanding or with removable top member
P4: Platform (container) — folding posts, either freestanding or with removable top member
T0: Tank container — nondangerous liquids, minimum pressure 45 kPa
T2: Tank container — nondangerous liquids, minimum pressure 265 kPa
T1: Tank container — nondangerous liquids, minimum pressure 150 kPa
T3: Tank container — dangerous liquids, minimum pressure 150 kPa
T4: Tank container — dangerous liquids, minimum pressure 265 kPa
T5: Tank container — dangerous liquids, minimum pressure 400 kPa
T6: Tank container — dangerous liquids, minimum pressure 600 kPa
T7: Tank container — gases, minimum pressure 910 kPa
T8: Tank container — gases, minimum pressure 2200 kPa
T9: Tank container — gases, minimum pressure (to be decided)
N0: Pressurised and non-pressurised tank container (dry) — hopper type vertical discharge
N1: Pressurised and non-pressurised tank container (dry) — hopper type rear discharge
N3: Pressurised and non-pressurised tank container (dry) — non-pressurised rear discharge
N4: Pressurised and non-pressurised tank container (dry) — non-pressurised side discharge
N5: Pressurised and non-pressurised tank container (dry) — non-pressurised tipping discharge
N7: Pressurised and non-pressurised tank container (dry) — pressurised rear discharge
N8: Pressurised and non-pressurised tank container (dry) — pressurised side discharge
N9: Pressurised and non-pressurised tank container (dry) — pressurised tipping discharge
K0: Pressurised tank container (liquids and gases) — liquid tank non-regulated goods
K1: Pressurised tank container (liquids and gases) — liquid tank dangerous goods ≤ 265 kPa pressure
K2: Pressurised tank container (liquids and gases) — liquid tank dangerous goods > 265 kPa and ≤ 1000 kPa pressure
K3: Pressurised tank container (liquids and gases) — liquid tank dangerous goods > 1000 kPa high pressure
K4: Pressurised tank container (liquids and gases) — liquid tank non-regulated goods requiring power supply
K5: Pressurised tank container (liquids and gases) — liquid tank for dangerous goods ≤ 1000 kPa requiring power supply
K6: Pressurised tank container (liquids and gases) — liquid tank for dangerous goods > 1000 kPa pressure requiring power supply
K7: Pressurised tank container (liquids and gases) — cryogenic tank
K8: Pressurised tank container (liquids and gases) — gas tank
